title: Circularity Attributes
description: A set of attributes related to circularity.

recyclability.description: Indicates whether the product is recyclable or not.

reusability.description: Indicates the level of reusability of the product.

repairability.description: Indicates the ease of repairing the product.

removability.description: Indicates the ease of removing components or materials for reuse or recycling.

recycled_content.description: Indicates the percentage of recycled content in the product.
